/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. 

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities, providing a stark contrast to the natural elements below.

In the distance, the iconic Great Wall of China can be seen, its imposing silhouette visible against the sky. This landmark, a symbol of China's rich history and cultural heritage, adds a unique element to the otherwise modern cityscape.

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. This perspective also allows for a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings, providing a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
